General.Name: Nanxing Furniture Machinery & Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanxing Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sales, and services for wood processing machinery in China, Germany, the United States, Russia, the Middle East, rest of Asia, and internationally. The company provides front and rear feed panel dividing saw, precision panel saw, angular dividing saw, and sliding table saw; CNC nesting machines; single- and double-sided edge banders; CNC drilling and feed drilling machines; and CNC machines, such as door panel processing, single and dual working tables, and five axis machining centers. It also offers automation equipment comprising feeders and stackers, turner equipment, and conveyor tables; and work station and line production machines. The company was formerly known as Nanxing Furniture Machinery & Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nanxing Machinery Co., Ltd. in June 2016. Nanxing Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.
General.Address: Science and Technology Industrial Park, Dongguan, China, 523000
